cycle_speed.docs:
Increments through speed levels of the fan with the given ID when executed. If the fan’s speed level is set to maximum when executed, fan will cycle off unless `off_speed_cycle` is set to `false`.

*See also: [`fan.cycle_speed` Action](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#fan-cycle-speed-action)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the fan.

*See also: [Fan Component](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#fan-cycle-speed-action)*

off_speed_cycle.docs:
**, boolean, [templatable](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-templatable)**: Determines if the fan will cycle off after cycling though its highest speed. Can be `true` or `false`. If `false` fan will cycle to its lowest speed instead of turning off.  Defaults to `true`.

*See also: [Fan Component](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#fan-cycle-speed-action)*

toggle.docs:
Toggles the ON/OFF state of the fan with the given ID when executed.

*See also: [`fan.toggle` Action](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#fan-toggle-action)*

turn_off.docs:
Turns the fan with the given ID off when executed.

*See also: [`fan.turn_off` Action](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#fan-turn-off-action)*

turn_on.docs:
Turns the fan with the given ID on when executed.

*See also: [`fan.turn_on` Action](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#fan-turn-on-action)*

direction.docs:
**, string, [templatable](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-templatable)**: Set the direction of the fan. Can be either `forward` or `reverse`. Defaults to not changing the direction.

*See also: [Fan Component](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#fan-turn-on-action)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the fan.

*See also: [Fan Component](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#fan-turn-on-action)*

oscillating.docs:
**, boolean, [templatable](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-templatable)**: Set the oscillation state of the fan. Defaults to not affecting oscillation.

*See also: [Fan Component](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#fan-turn-on-action)*

speed.docs:
**, int, [templatable](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-templatable)**: Set the speed level of the fan. Can be a number between 1 and the maximum speed level of the fan.

*See also: [Fan Component](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#fan-turn-on-action)*

bedjet.docs:
The `fan` platform exposes the BedJet’s fan-related functionality, including on/off and speed control.

*See also: [bedjet Fan](https://esphome.io/components/climate/bedjet.html#bedjet-fan)*

binary.docs:
The `binary` fan platform lets you represent any binary [Output Component](https://esphome.io/components/output/index.html#output) as a fan.

*See also: [Binary Fan](https://esphome.io/components/fan/binary.html#binary-fan)*

hbridge.docs:
The `hbridge` fan platform allows you to use a compatible *h-bridge* (L298N, DRV8871, MX1508, BTS7960, L9110S, DRV8833, TB6612, etc.) to control a fan (or motor/solenoid).

*See also: [H-bridge Fan](https://esphome.io/components/fan/hbridge.html#h-bridge-fan)*

speed.docs:
The `speed` fan platform lets you represent any float [Output Component](https://esphome.io/components/output/index.html#output) as a fan that supports speed settings.

*See also: [Speed Fan](https://esphome.io/components/fan/speed.html#speed-fan)*

template.docs:
The `template` fan platform lets you create a fan interface using only triggers.

*See also: [Template Fan](https://esphome.io/components/fan/template.html#template-fan)*

tuya.docs:
The `tuya` fan platform creates a variable speed fan from a tuya component.

*See also: [Tuya Fan](https://esphome.io/components/fan/tuya.html#tuya-fan)*

id.docs:
**, string**: Manually specify the ID for code generation. At least one of **id** and **name** must be specified.

*See also: [Fan Component](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#base-fan-configuration)*

on_direction_set.docs:
**, [Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action)**: An automation to perform when the fan direction is changed. See [fan.on_direction_set Trigger](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#fan-on-direction-set-trigger).

*See also: [Fan Component](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#base-fan-configuration)*

on_oscillating_set.docs:
**, [Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action)**: An automation to perform when the fan oscillating state is changed. See [fan.on_oscillating_set Trigger](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#fan-on-oscillating-set-trigger).

*See also: [Fan Component](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#base-fan-configuration)*

on_preset_set.docs:
**, [Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action)**: An automation to perform when the fan preset mode is changed. See [fan.on_preset_set Trigger](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#fan-on-preset-set-trigger).

*See also: [Fan Component](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#base-fan-configuration)*

on_speed_set.docs:
**, [Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action)**: An automation to perform when the fan speed is changed. See [fan.on_speed_set Trigger](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#fan-on-speed-set-trigger).

*See also: [Fan Component](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#base-fan-configuration)*

on_state.docs:
**, [Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action)**: An automation to perform when the fan state is changed. See [fan.on_state Trigger](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#fan-on-state-trigger).

*See also: [Fan Component](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#base-fan-configuration)*

on_turn_off.docs:
**, [Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action)**: An automation to perform when the fan is turned off. See [fan.on_turn_on / fan.on_turn_off Trigger](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#fan-on-turn-on-off-trigger).

*See also: [Fan Component](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#base-fan-configuration)*

on_turn_on.docs:
**, [Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action)**: An automation to perform when the fan is turned on. See [fan.on_turn_on / fan.on_turn_off Trigger](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#fan-on-turn-on-off-trigger).

*See also: [Fan Component](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#base-fan-configuration)*

oscillation_command_topic.docs:
**, string**: The topic to receive oscillation commands on.

*See also: [Fan Component](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#base-fan-configuration)*

oscillation_state_topic.docs:
**, string**: The topic to publish fan oscillation state changes to.

*See also: [Fan Component](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#base-fan-configuration)*

restore_mode.docs:
Control how the fan attempts to restore state on boot.
  * `NO_RESTORE` - Don’t restore any state.
  
  * `RESTORE_DEFAULT_OFF` - Attempt to restore state and default to OFF if not possible to restore.
  
  * `RESTORE_DEFAULT_ON` - Attempt to restore state and default to ON.
  
  * `RESTORE_INVERTED_DEFAULT_OFF` - Attempt to restore state inverted from the previous state and default to OFF.
  
  * `RESTORE_INVERTED_DEFAULT_ON` - Attempt to restore state inverted from the previous state and default to ON.
  
  * `ALWAYS_OFF` (Default) - Always initialize the fan as OFF on bootup.
  
  * `ALWAYS_ON` - Always initialize the fan as ON on bootup.
  
  

*See also: [Fan Component](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#base-fan-configuration)*

ALWAYS_ON.docs: Always initialize the fan as ON on bootup.

RESTORE_DEFAULT_OFF.docs: Attempt to restore state and default to OFF if not possible to restore.

RESTORE_DEFAULT_ON.docs: Attempt to restore state and default to ON.

RESTORE_INVERTED_DEFAULT_OFF.docs: Attempt to restore state inverted from the previous state and default to OFF.

RESTORE_INVERTED_DEFAULT_ON.docs: Attempt to restore state inverted from the previous state and default to ON.

speed_command_topic.docs:
**, string**: The topic to receive speed commands on (options: LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH).

*See also: [Fan Component](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#base-fan-configuration)*

speed_level_command_topic.docs:
**, int**: The topic to receive numeric speed commands on (range: 0 to speed count).

*See also: [Fan Component](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#base-fan-configuration)*

speed_level_state_topic.docs:
**, int**: The topic to publish numeric fan speed state changes to (range: 0 to speed count).

*See also: [Fan Component](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#base-fan-configuration)*

speed_state_topic.docs:
**, string**: The topic to publish fan speed state changes to (options: LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH).

*See also: [Fan Component](https://esphome.io/components/fan/index.html#base-fan-configuration)*
